summary: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.
cast: Julia Roberts|Billy Crystal|Catherine Zeta-Jones|John Cusack|Hank Azaria|Stanley Tucci|Christopher Walken|Alan Arkin|Seth Green|Scot Zeller|Larry King|Steve Pink|Rainn Wilson|Eric Balfour|Marty Belafsky|Keri Lynn Pratt|Maria Canals-Barrera|Charley Steiner|Shaun Robinson|Jeff Michael|Sibila Vargas|Jane Yamamoto|Byron Allen|Wendy Schenker|Jim Ferguson|Lisa Joyner|Patrick Stoner|Sam Rubin|Susan Katz|Maree Cheatham|Alexander Enberg|Sarah Loew|Joseph Feingold|Sherry Jennings|Julie Sorrels|Austin L. Sorrels|Julie Wagner|Leilani Münter|Dimitri Moraitis|Shawn Driscoll|Misti See|Gail Laskowski|John P. Anthony|Joel Ariniello|Amber Barretto|Candice T. title: La pareja del año
